University of Manitoba CultureX 2020

March 20 & 22 2020
Learn More

Early bird tickets are now available for $15!


An Intercultural celebration


The heart of this event is to promote collaboration and integration across the wider international community at the University of Manitoba. Over the last few years, the university has experienced an expansion and increase in the number of international students, but there still exists a wide gap between how these students interact with the resources available to support them and with their immediate community and its members.

By having an event like this, we hope to increase an awareness, respect and sensitivity among international students; for other cultures, religions and people. It is important not only to celebrate one’s country but also celebrate the diversity that exists on our campus by intentionally celebrating each other.

Reach out to any of the student groups to get tickets!

  • UMISO
    University of Manitoba International Student Organization
  • UNICEF
    The United Nations Children's Fund
  • LAKSH
  • ISA
    Indian Students' Association
